item.title: About This Site
item.description: Summary Host a personal website on Github using the Hugo site generator. Updates to content will be incorporated into the site via triggered Github Actions. My Choices Originally, I was using Frozen-Flask and FlatPages to build my static site. Flask, as backend tool I was familiar with, was something I was interested in leveraging for this website. Ultimately, it felt like a hodge-podge project, loosely slapped together which could have been executed in a better way.
